BrandText.topContents1: VIRNECT finds solutions by connecting virtual reality with our clients' reality.
BrandText.logoContents: VIRNECT's core values are to maintain trust, lead the market, and pursue win-win relationships. To maintain consistency in expressing our identity, our logo works as a key element in our product design and a criterion for symbolic visualization.
BrandText.twinContents1: The color blue implies that VIRNECT highly values building and maintaining trust with clients and that it will work for the improvement of their working environments.
BrandText.twinContents2: The bold logotype visualizes VIRNECT's will to create sustainable solutions by leading the AR/DT market.
BrandText.twinContents3: Signifies the value of blending and balancing the differences in society for the prosperity of humanity, the nation, and society as a whole.
BrandText.downText: VIRNECT's symbol mark and logotype cannot be modified or recombined. If you wish to use our signature, logotype, etc., please download our CI file and use it as is.
BrandText.logoContents2: VIRNECT's hexagonal motif logo represents the harmony and connection among all of the information and human resources that form the industry. It is used to distinguish VIRNECT's variety of products.

aboutVirnectTitle.title: VIRNECT is a leading industrial XR solution company.
aboutVirnectTitle.content: VIRNECT is a leading industrial XR solution company. We connect critical data from industrial sites through virtual reality. We enable our customers to access the information they need from anywhere through XR services. We create value by linking people/robots, time/space, information/knowledge/wisdom, and we are striving to grow into the global No.1 XR platform company for a world where XR technology is used in all aspects of life.

aboutVirnectContent.mission: Create a Smart, Convenient, and Sustainable Low-Carbon Future By connecting reality/virtuality, people/robots, time/space, and information/knowledge/wisdom.
aboutVirnectContent.vision: Global No.1 XR Platform Company A world where XR technology permeate every aspect of our life

aboutHistory2021.title: Industrial XR leader

aboutHistory2021.list3: • Received the Korea Metaverse Award & IT World Award (XR Solution Category)

aboutHistory2019.title: Series A funding
aboutHistory2019.list2: • Received 8 awards including one from the Minister of Science and ICT of Korea
aboutHistory2019.list3: • Raised USD 9 million in Series A funding

customersContent.content: Growing together by putting our customers first
